definitions.definition: A two-handed pole weapon , consisting of a long pole with an axe -like blade mounted on it (at a right angle like an axe, not on the tip like a spear), and (opposite the blade) typically a spike or hook .

main_definition: A two-handed pole weapon , consisting of a long pole with an axe -like blade mounted on it (at a right angle like an axe, not on the tip like a spear), and (opposite the blade) typically a spike or hook .
